commenter_a: Absolutely NOT! 1.The video is incomplete. 2. The cops appeared to be outnumbered at least 4:1 3. He did not use lethal force. He restrained an individual who was not obeying his directive. 4. When another individual came from behind him; he did as any police officer would and drew their weapon. He then quickly holstered it when the threat was lessened. 5. If these kids showed proper respect for law enforcement; this would have been a different story.
